channel.title: ColoredRainbow/317 Server/Awesome Home/NeedStaff/DeltaServer!Over 300 customs!
channel.description:
Hey,all, this is my first post about my Server : this server has been for sure 1 month online, over 15 people, as u can see, us server has been ""Supported by Fans"". -------------------------------------- We Took a Blank Source, NO leeching, weve done good by now. now Some Stuff, wil be gett coded Soon:
VPS ( Were Gonna Buy IT ) CUSTOMS 100% WORKING SKILLZ SOON CONSTRUCTION NEW CLIENT SuperSupportRank + SupperDonator Rank! 50mbSource! AND MUCH MORE! ------------------------
Well: We [TheDevelopmentFromColoredRainbow] Need some More Support. [Beta Testers 0/3] ( will get Support [WillBeCodedSoon]! ) [Hoster 0/1] ( Will Get Owner/NeedsToBeTrusted ) [Modeler 0/2] ( Will Get A StaffSpot Soon ) [Advertiser 0/5] ( Will get Support [WillBeCodedSoon] ) [ItemCoder 0/2] (Will Get A StaffSpot Soon ) ----------------------- How To Apply ( PLEASE PM APPLY ): [ Apply for Advetiser/BetaTESTER] Votes once a day -10 in-game rep -50 forum posts (spam does not count) -Played for at least one month -Is active in-game -Advertises, and gets at least 10 new active players -Is a mature player -Speaks proper english, I know many of you guys do not English that well, but please try to speak it better. Also, speaking in 1337 is not allowed (Hey Salthesmexy,4RDX s8ch agud 0wner can i hazzz mos pleash?)
-What are some memorable things you've done to help someone? -If you were apart of the staff in-game, how would you help? -Do you have any experience with moderating on private servers, if so, what? -Have you ever committed a serious offense in the game? -About how long have you been playing Project Rainbow? -Why do you think you would be a good Moderator/Administrator/Support? -How knowledgeable are you with Project Rainbow in-game? [NEW QUESTION ADDED BY SAMM'] -What is your total level? ------------------------- [APPLY FOR FORUM STAFF ] -Votes once a day -100 forum posts -Is active on forums -Utilizes proper grammar
-What are some memorable things you've done to help someone? -If you were apart of the staff on the forums, how would you help? -Do you have any experience with moderating on private servers, if so, what? -Have you ever committed a serious offense in the game? -About how long have you been playing Project Rainbow? -Why do you think you would be a good Moderator/Administrator? -What is your total level? ------------------------------- [Apply For Hoster] Name: Age: How Long U Doing This?: Experience?: Proof: Msn: ------------------------ [Apply For Modeler/ItemCoder] Name: Age: What Modeler do YOU USE?: Nicest Thing Uve Coded?: Msn?: ------------------------ hey PEOPLE, WE REALY NEED A DELTA CODER, IF ANYONE INTERESTED FILL AN APPLY IN + we got updated over 300 Customs! + they are cool! Sorry, The Client Hasnt been UpdatedYET,SO No PICTURES! Please Contact : [email]samm_like_a_boss@hotmail.com[/email]

I quited whit my server and some months ago i found it back .[/quote]

Colored Rainbow has been out for about three months.

item.title: ColoredRainbow/317 Server/Awesome Home/NeedStaff/DeltaServer!Over 300 customs!
item.dc:creator: @salthesmexy salthesmexy
item.description:
@salthesmexy wrote:

Hey,all, this is my first post about my Server :
this server has been for sure 1 month online,
over 15 people, as u can see,
us server has been ““Supported by Fans””.

We Took a Blank Source, NO leeching, weve done good by now.
now Some Stuff, wil be gett coded Soon:

VPS ( Were Gonna Buy IT )
CUSTOMS
100% WORKING SKILLZ
SOON CONSTRUCTION
NEW CLIENT
SuperSupportRank + SupperDonator Rank!
50mbSource!
AND MUCH MORE!

Well: We [TheDevelopmentFromColoredRainbow] Need some More Support.
[Beta Testers 0/3] ( will get Support [WillBeCodedSoon]! )
[Hoster 0/1] ( Will Get Owner/NeedsToBeTrusted )
[Modeler 0/2] ( Will Get A StaffSpot Soon )
[Advertiser 0/5] ( Will get Support [WillBeCodedSoon] )
[ItemCoder 0/2] (Will Get A StaffSpot Soon )

How To Apply ( PLEASE PM APPLY ):
[ Apply for Advetiser/BetaTESTER]
Votes once a day
-10 in-game rep
-50 forum posts (spam does not count)
-Played for at least one month
-Is active in-game
-Advertises, and gets at least 10 new active players
-Is a mature player
-Speaks proper english, I know many of you guys do not English that well, but please try to speak it better. Also, speaking in 1337 is not allowed (Hey Salthesmexy,4RDX s8ch agud 0wner can i hazzz mos pleash?)

-What are some memorable things you’ve done to help someone?
-If you were apart of the staff in-game, how would you help?
-Do you have any experience with moderating on private servers, if so, what?
-Have you ever committed a serious offense in the game?
-About how long have you been playing Project Rainbow?
-Why do you think you would be a good Moderator/Administrator/Support?
-How knowledgeable are you with Project Rainbow in-game? [NEW QUESTION ADDED BY SAMM’]
-What is your total level?

[APPLY FOR FORUM STAFF ]
-Votes once a day
-100 forum posts
-Is active on forums
-Utilizes proper grammar

-What are some memorable things you’ve done to help someone?
-If you were apart of the staff on the forums, how would you help?
-Do you have any experience with moderating on private servers, if so, what?
-Have you ever committed a serious offense in the game?
-About how long have you been playing Project Rainbow?
-Why do you think you would be a good Moderator/Administrator?
-What is your total level?

[Apply For Hoster]
Name:
Age:
How Long U Doing This?:
Experience?:
Proof:
Msn:

[Apply For Modeler/ItemCoder]
Name:
Age:
What Modeler do YOU USE?:
Nicest Thing Uve Coded?:
Msn?:

hey PEOPLE, WE REALY NEED A DELTA CODER, IF ANYONE INTERESTED FILL AN APPLY IN

  • we got updated over 300 Customs!
  • they are cool!
    Sorry, The Client Hasnt been UpdatedYET,SO No PICTURES!
    Please Contact : samm_like_a_boss@hotmail.com

Read full topic
